title: A Tale of Two Goblins
description: When Knight Vander approaches me with a case regarding comatose victims, I agree to help him, imagining the most difficult part will be combatting my attraction to him.But what Iâ€™m not betting on is the fact that the case becomes personal when I learn all the victims are somehow linked to me.When my best friend falls victim to the Dreamstalker, I must do everything in my power to ensure her survival, including associating with criminals and accepting the fact that desperate times do definitely call for desperate measures.A TALE OF TWO GOBLINS is the second book in the bestselling Dulcie O'Neil series of fairy fantasy / paranormal romance.
author: H.P. Mallory
